story: As a user, I want to reset my password via email so that I can regain account access.
As an admin, I want to export all user activity logs in CSV format so that I can analyze system usage.
As a customer, I want to view my order history so that I can track my purchases.
As a user, I want to update my profile picture so that my account feels personalized.
As a teacher, I want to create assignments and assign them to multiple classes so that I can save time.
As a user, I want to receive push notifications for new messages so that I stay updated in real time.
As a manager, I want to generate monthly performance dashboards so that I can track KPIs.
As a guest, I want to browse the product catalog without signing in so that I can explore freely.
As a customer, I want to apply discount codes at checkout so that I can save money.
As a developer, I want to integrate payment gateways (PayPal, Stripe) so that transactions are secure.
